about_the_game:
What's the deal with Rin-Timber? What is this cunning character really up to? This bonus DLC will take us into the mind of Rin-Timber and let us see what this sneaky fellow is thinking. Add this to your Alpha Hole Prison game for free! Click 'Bonus Content' on the main menu to find this free DLC.

Press 'v' on your keyboard to have all text read aloud.

content_descriptors.notes:
Graphic sexually explicit content for adults only.

Warnings for:  violent scenes, rape, and torture.

  • Processor: 1GHz
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card

  • Processor: 1GHz
